name: Sharp Wands
description:
Sharp Wands - WIP

Sharp wands, lets you fight your friends in a couch-coop experience with multiple playable characters, different game modes fully customizable, statuses and many obstacles to avoid and use at your own advantage!

  • 2 - 4 Players local multiplayer
  • 4 different characters to play each with its own custom statistics and colors
  • Customization system to make the game exactly as you want to play it
  • Status effects for each map
  • Plenty of unique obstacles
  • Flexible team option allowing also to gang up on that annoying strong friend 😉
  • 3 different game modes: Deathmatch, Hold the Flag, Last Hit
  • 40 maps to play

Each character has a common move-set, which includes combo melee, charged melee, combo ranged, charged ranged and guard.

There are currently 2 different game modes: Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. Each mode has a set of parameters that improve replayability by changing the match parameters such as rounds, duration, score target... With 3+ players there is also the option to set teams. Team up and support each other to win the game! Every team combination is valid: 1v3, 2v2

Each game is fully customizable so you can play whatever game you prefer. You might choose to play short and intense matches, or you may prefer a longer and strategic approach, the choice is yours!
